 2019-00562019-01-31
ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Finance of PETER DHILLON, O.B.C., of Vancouver, British Columbia, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term commencing on March 1, 2019 and ending on February 28, 2022.
